motel: ^A motel decked out in neon lights comes into view. Could be a good place to rest.

rest_success: ^You check in and have a decent time undisturbed by pests or other guests. In the morning, you load up your RV with some complimentary gas and get going.
rest_fail: ^You sleep okay, but in the morning it seems someone siphoned fuel from the RV while you were busy with the complimentary breakfast. Oh well.

leave: ^These types of places are just a little too shady for your tastes. You keep on moving.
